list_translation_mean.translate_mean: điều tra và viết phóng sự

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give a spoken or written account of something that one has observed, heard, done, or investigated.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the representative reported a decline in milk and meat production
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người đại diện đã báo cáo sự suy giảm về sản xuất sữa và thịt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: present oneself formally as having arrived at a particular place or as ready to do something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Stewart is to report to a probation office on Monday
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Stewart là báo cáo cho một văn phòng quản chế vào thứ Hai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be responsible to (a superior or supervisor).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he reports to the chairman of the committee
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông báo cáo với Chủ tịch Ủy ban

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an account given of a particular matter, especially in the form of an official document, after thorough investigation or consideration by an appointed person or body.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Báo cáo hàng năm của Chủ tịch

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of information that is unsupported by firm evidence and that the speaker feels may or may not be true.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: reports were circulating that the chairman was about to resign
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các báo cáo đã lưu hành rằng Chủ tịch sắp từ chức

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sudden loud noise of or like an explosion or gunfire.
an employee who is supervised by another employee.
the way in which someone or something is regarded; reputation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: whatsoever things are lovely and of good report
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bất cứ điều gì đáng yêu và của báo cáo tốt
